text: The American University of the Caribbean (AUCHaiti) is a 501(c)(3) non-profit institution of higher education incorporated in Florida and Republic of Haiti, established in 1985. AUCHaiti is a non-denominational Christ-centered university. The university is approved and chartered by the Haitian Ministry of Education to award academic degrees. ==References== ==External links== * American University of the Caribbean/homepage Category:Universities in Haiti Category:Buildings and structures in Les Cayes Category:1985 establishments in Haiti Category:Christian universities and colleges Category:Educational institutions established in 1985
title: American University of the Caribbean (Haiti)
